name: Tech's War
description:
In this game you have to control a tank, destroy enemies and survive as long as possible. There are 2 kinds of enemies:

  • Numerous tiny-helicopter-bombs
  • Airships with missiles

And many different boxes:

  • Repairing details to increase tank HP
  • Improvement details, each kind has 3 levels and may be advanced 2 times:
    • Radar
    • Gun
    • Speed
  • Missiles that automatically destroy the enemies
  • TNT that can damage both you and enemies

Use WASD to move and mouse clicking to shoot. Note that the game works correctly with Google Chrome desktop browser only.

I've developed this game in 2013 at high school and it's still fun so I decided to share it. Enjoy! ^_^ Follow my pages to stay in touch and get updates on my present projects:

  • Facebook
  • Vk
  • Telegram
